content: this pattern is property of mon petit violon designs you can t modify resell or share this pattern you can sell finished items made from it but please mention that the item is made using mon petit violon pattern mon petit violon designs © 2013 pattern buttoned jacket for 0-3 and 3-6 months yoke for both sizes row 1 ch49 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each of next 6ch * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in each of next 5ch * repeat from * 5 times more double_crochet in each of next 3ch turn row 2 ch3 double_crochet in next 8 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet* repeat from * 5 times more double_crochet in next 2dc turn row 3 ch3 double_crochet in next 9 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 9 double_crochet* repeat from * 5 times more double_crochet in last double_crochet turn thank you for buying my pattern i row 4 ch3 double_crochet in next 10 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 hope you will enjoy it space double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet* repeat from * 5 times more turn sizes and measurements size finished chest finished length row 5 ch3 double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 0-3 months 46cm/18in 23cm/9in space double_crochet in next 13 double_crochet* repeat from * 4 times more 3-6 months 52cm/20 ½in 28cm/11in double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 12dc turn 6-12 months 63cm/25in 30cm/12in 12-24 months 68 5cm/27in 33cm/13in for size 0-3 months continue with the body part for size 3-6 months work next row and then continue with the body part materials  any worsted weight medium 4 yarn for the sample i only for size 3-6 months used debbie bliss fez aran shade rose 150 row 6 ch3 double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 150 250 250 g or 330 330 550 550 yards space double_crochet in next 15 double_crochet* repeat from * 4 times more  crochet hook 4mm g or size needed to obtain gauge double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 13dc turn  4 or 6 buttons body part instructions are for size 0-3months changes for size 3-6months are please check the gauge before you start in … work 14st and 8 row in double_crochet to measure 10x10cm or 4x4in row 1 ch1 single_crochet in next 13 14 double_crochet ch5 skip ch1 and next using 4mm g hook or size required to obtain gauge 24 26 double_crochet single_crochet in next 29 35 sts here ch1 counts as a stitch too and you have to work single_crochet in it ch5 skip next 24 26 double_crochet and ch1 single_crochet in next 13 14 double_crochet turn stitches used st s stitch es chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet *do not count stitches from the photo the sample is from other
